attributes.background: One man for decades has fought by himself to get back the sovereignty of our proud nation. I believe that this gentleman should be honoured with the biggest thank you, a knighthood by Her Majesty the Queen.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:
https://www.gov.uk/honours
